title: CMS Finalizes Prior Authorization Requirements for Medicare Advantage Plans Effective 2026
summary: Plans must now respond to urgent prior authorization requests within 72 hours and standard requests within 7 days. The rule affects every billing team touching Medicare Advantage.
description: Plans must now respond to urgent prior authorization requests within 72 hours and standard requests within 7 days. The rule affects every billing team touching Medicare Advantage â€” here's the plain-English breakdown and your 48-hour action plan.

title: MetLife PDP Plus Network Changes: The DSO Revenue Leak Nobody's Talking About
summary: DSOs with Careington umbrella contracts are being repriced at PDP rates without realizing it. Here's how to audit your EOBs before Q2.
description: DSOs with Careington umbrella contracts are being repriced at PDP rates without realizing it. Here's how to audit your EOBs before Q2.

title: UHC Expands Prior Auth Requirements March 2026: What You Need to Know
summary: UnitedHealthcare is adding 47 new CPT codes to prior authorization requirements effective March 1. Medical necessity denials expected to jump 20-30%.
description: UnitedHealthcare is adding 47 new CPT codes to prior authorization requirements effective March 1. Medical necessity denials expected to jump 20-30%.

title: Zelis-Cigna DPPO Integration Complete: Fee Schedule Changes Impact $2.1B in Annual Claims
summary: Zelis has finalized integration of Cigna's DPPO network. Practices seeing 8-12% repricing on select procedure codes. No prior notice was provided.
description: Zelis has finalized integration of Cigna's DPPO network. Practices seeing 8-12% repricing on select procedure codes. No prior notice was provided.

title: BCBS Texas Transitions 120K Members to DNOA Network
summary: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Texas is moving employer group members to the DNOA leased network. Expect fee schedule changes for D2000-D4000 series codes.
description: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Texas is moving employer group members to the DNOA leased network. Expect fee schedule changes for D2000-D4000 series codes.
